title: Transfer Kingdom Launches Ready-to-Apply Custom Patches
description: Transfer Kingdom launches ready-to-apply custom patches offering no-sew, durable options for hats, apparel, and accessories. With fast shipping and easy application, it empowers creators and small businesses to add professional branding without special equipment. Houston, Texas--(Newsfile Corp. - August 11, 2025) - Transfer Kingdom, Houston's largest Direct-to-Film (DTF) printing hub, has officially launched its newest product line: ready-to-apply custom patches, available now at TKPatches.
content:
Transfer Kingdom launches ready-to-apply custom patches offering no-sew, durable options for hats, apparel, and accessories. With fast shipping and easy application, it empowers creators and small businesses to add professional branding without special equipment.

Houston, Texas--(Newsfile Corp. - August 11, 2025) - Transfer Kingdom, Houston's largest Direct-to-Film (DTF) printing hub, has officially launched its newest product line: ready-to-apply custom patches, available now at TKPatches.com. These easy-to-use patches offer customers a stylish and durable decoration method for garments, hats, and accessories with no sewing required.

From entrepreneurs and small clothing brands to major merch creators, customers across the U.S. rely on Transfer Kingdom for same-day printing and fast nationwide shipping. With the addition of high-quality patches, the company is reinforcing its position as a true one-stop print shop, delivering everything from DTF heat transfers to custom branding elements all under one roof.

"We wanted to make custom patches as accessible as our DTF transfers," said Kevin Atlig, founder of Transfer Kingdom. "Now, anyone can create a professional finish on hats, jackets without expensive machinery or complicated steps."

TK Patches, the brand's dedicated patch store, offers a wide selection of styles including embroidered patches and genuine leather patches. Each patch is designed to be applied in seconds using a household iron or heat press perfect for small businesses and creators alike.
• Available in vibrant stitched or engraved finishes
• Easy to apply, no sewing or equipment required
• Ideal for hats, uniforms, backpacks, jackets, jeans, and more

With their quick application process and budget-friendly options, these patches make it possible to personalize garments and accessories without the need for specialized tools or advanced skills.



By making patches as simple and accessible as DTF transfers, Transfer Kingdom is helping businesses of all sizes level up their product offerings with high-impact, professional decoration options.

For customers in Houston, the in-store Heat Press Room at 10611 Harwin Dr. #406 offers a space to apply patches or DTF transfers right on the spot. This setup supports both individuals and small businesses, making it easy to complete a project without needing to invest in personal equipment.
summary: Transfer Kingdom, Houston's largest Direct-to-Film (DTF) printing hub, has launched its newest product line: ready to-apply custom patches. These patches offer no-sew, durable options for hats, apparel, and accessories without sewing. The easy application and quick shipping process empowers creators and small businesses to add professional branding without needing special equipment. The company's dedicated patch store, TK Patches, offers a wide selection of styles including embroidered patches and genuine leather patches. The in-store Heat Press Room at 10611 Harwin Dr. #406 offers a space to apply patches or DTF transfers right on the spot.
shortSummary: Transfer Kingdom launches ready-to-apply custom patches, offering durable, stitched finishes, and easy application, enhancing small business and personalization options without requiring specialized equipment.

Check out our Cricut EasyPress heat guide and heat press guide articles.
Ready-to-press DTF transfers are perfect for adding a touch of creativity to your garments.
With a wide range of design options to choose from, you can easily find the perfect design and it's easy to apply heat transfer films in second on shirts or any fabric.
Custom DTF Gang Sheets
If you don't have time to choose designs, try our premade DTF gang sheets.
We created from the best seller's t-shirt designs.

Pressure-Sensitive Backing
Clean the surface area thoroughly using rubbing alcohol.
Peel off the paper liner and firmly press the patch onto the desired location.
For best adhesion, ensure the surface is smooth, clean, and dry before applying.
Low Melt Backing — Using a 360 IQ™ Hat Heat Press (For Hats)
- Top Platen Temperature: 255°–265°F
- Bottom Platen Temperature: 315°–320°F
- Pressure: 60–80 PSI
- Preheat: Not required
- Dwell Time: 15–18 seconds
- Instructions: Place the hat on the heat press, making sure to leave the internal lining out of the press zone. Apply heat directly to the patch area for proper adhesion.
Low Melt Backing — With Top & Bottom Heat (For Garments)
- Top Platen Temperature: 255°–265°F
- Bottom Platen Temperature: 315°–320°F
- Pressure: 60–80 PSI
- Preheat: Not required
- Dwell Time: 15–18 seconds
- Optional Protection: For delicate fabrics such as nylon, lycra, or 100% polyester, we recommend using a FlexStyle® Silicone Pad on top of the garment during pressing.
Low Melt Backing — With Top Heat Only (For Garments)
- Temperature: 315°–325°F
- Pressure: 70–80 PSI
- Preheat: Not required
- Dwell Time: 14–18 seconds
- Instructions: Position the patch on the desired location and hold it in place using thermal tape. Turn the garment inside out and apply heat from the interior side.
- Optional: Use a FlexStyle® Silicone Pad over the garment for extra protection on delicate fabrics.
🔥 Industrial Heat Seal (For High-Temperature Garment Application)
- Top & Bottom Temperature: 395°–405°F
- Pressure: 60–80 PSI
- Preheat: Not required
- Dwell Time: 10–14 seconds
Note: When applying to heat-sensitive or fine fabrics, a silicone pad can help prevent damage.
⚠️ Disclaimer
TK Patches recommends testing various heat seal settings prior to full production. Application results may vary depending on fabric type, equipment, and conditions. TK Patches is not responsible for any damage caused during application due to improper heat settings or untested materials.

Custom Patches Made Simple – Durable, Detailed, Delivered Fast
Expertly Crafted Using High-End Materials. Delivered Within 1-3 weeks. No Setup Fees Ever.
Choose Patch
Select the patch type that best fits your style. Explore our wide range of options.

No design? No problem. Our team is here to help.

Production & Delivery
We make your patches and ship them fast—nationwide.
Usage Suggestions and Inspiration
Add a personal touch to your jackets, backpacks, or hats with your custom patch. Perfect for clubs, cosplay, events, or just showing off your unique style!
What Sets Us Apart
Free Design Assistance
Submit your idea—we’ll help you turn it into a production-ready patch design at no extra charge.
Fast Turnaround Time
Most orders are shipped within 7 business days. Rush service is available.
Bulk Order Discounts
Get wholesale pricing for larger quantities without compromising on quality.
100% Quality Guarantee
We inspect every patch for accuracy, color, and stitching—your satisfaction is guaranteed.
What Is a Custom Patch?
Custom patches are decorative or functional piece made of fabric, often customized with embroidery, print, or sublimation. Custom patches are used for branding, promotions, uniforms, fashion, and personal expression. They can be sewn, ironed, or attached with Velcro to garments, bags, hats, or gear.
What to Consider When Choosing a Custom Patch?
Purpose of Use
Determine where and how your patch will be used—on products, apparel, promotional items, or work uniforms.
Durability
Consider how the patch will hold up to washing, weather, or physical use. Look for materials and backing options that are water-resistant and long-lasting.
Material Type
Choose based on your design and usage:
- Embroidered patches for a classic raised texture
- Sublimated patches for photo-like detail
- Leather patches for a premium, rugged look
- Woven patches for intricate detail with a smooth finish
Application Method:
Match the patch to your needs:
- Iron-on patches for DIY use
- Sew-on patches for durability
- Velcro patches for flexibility and removability
- Adhesive patches for short-term or event use
Custom Patch Design Tips
Simplicity Is Key
Overly detailed or cluttered designs can be hard to read when reduced to patch size. Stick with clean shapes, bold lines, and limited text.
Color Contrast:
Ensure strong contrast between background and foreground elements for visibility. Avoid light-on-light or dark-on-dark combinations.
Appropriate Sizing
Design your patch to fit the intended surface—whether a jacket sleeve, cap front, or chest area. Scaling matters for both visibility and placement.
Need Wholesale Patches? Partner with TK Patches
Custom Patch Manufacturing at Scale – Fast, Flexible, and Reliable
Are you a brand, distributor, apparel decorator, marketing agency, or reseller looking for a reliable source of high-quality custom patches in bulk? TK Patches offers wholesale patch production services that are scalable, efficient, and fully customizable to your business needs.
Whether you're launching a streetwear line, outfitting your security or corporate teams, or fulfilling retail demand—we're your trusted custom patch manufacturer in the USA.
What We Offer for Wholesale Clients:
We manufacture and fulfill bulk custom patch orders quickly—whether you need 500 or 50,000 units. Our optimized workflow ensures fast lead times and consistent quality.
Need your patches shipped under your brand? We offer white-label patch packaging, barcode labeling, and direct shipping to your fulfillment center or customer.
Choose from embroidered, woven, PVC, sublimated, chenille, leather, or 3D patches—all available for wholesale orders with full customization options.
Get competitive wholesale pricing on all patch styles with tiered discounts based on quantity. Ideal for resale, uniforms, team gear, or brand merchandising.
Your account gets a dedicated patch expert to guide you through design, sampling, production, and delivery.

argos_summary: Transfer Kingdom has launched a new line of ready-to-apply custom patches, designed for easy application on hats, apparel, and accessories without the need for sewing or special equipment. These patches, available through TKPatches.com, cater to a variety of customers, from small businesses to larger merch creators, offering fast shipping and same-day printing. The patches come in various styles, including embroidered and leather options, and are aimed at enhancing professional branding for creators and entrepreneurs.
